com.mapdigit.gis.raster

Class MapClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapdigit.gis.MapLayer
      • com.mapdigit.gis.MapLayerContainer
        • com.mapdigit.gis.DigitalMap
          • com.mapdigit.gis.raster.RasterMap
            • com.mapdigit.gis.raster.MapClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IReaderListener, java.lang.Runnable

    public class MapClient
extends RasterMap
implements java.lang.Runnable, IReaderListener
    Map Client ,prvoide improved dynamic performance of the raster map.Asynchronized for pan ,zoom in/zoom out.
    © Copyright 2009 Guidebee Pty Ltd.
